= Automated Tomcat Deployment with Jenkins SSH Plugin = 

== Architecture ==

<img width="300" src="http://xebia-france.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/cont-delivery-img/jenkins-ssh-plugin.png"/>

== Lab ==

Note: the [https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/SSH+plugin Jenkins SSH Plugin] is already installed on your jenkins server.
 # Deploy a {{{tomcat-deploy-petclinic}}} shell script on the tomcat-team-1-dev-1 server
  # ssh connect as user tomcat
   {{{
ssh -i continuous-delivery-workshop.pem tomcat@ec2-46-137-33-136.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com
}}}
  # create a {{{/usr/share/tomcat6/bin/tomcat-deploy-petclinic}}} to download a new version of tomcat
   * See [http://xebia-france.googlecode.com/svn/cloudcomputing/xebia-cloudcomputing-extras/trunk/src/main/scripts/fr/xebia/workshop/continuousdelivery/tomcat-deploy-petclinic tomcat-deploy-petclinic]
 # Connect to your *Jenkins* server: [${infrastructure.jenkinsUrl}]
 # In the *Manage Jenkins* of Jenkins, go to the page *System Configuration*
 # In the section called : *SSH Remote hosts*, enter:
  * Host: {{{ec2-46-137-33-136.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com}}}
  * Port: #blank#
  * Username: {{{tomcat}}}
  * Password: #blank#
  * Keyfile: {{{/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/continuous-delivery-workshop.pem}}}
 # *Save* the settings
 # Create a new *Free Style Project* for Jenkins with the following parameters
 # Activation option called *Execute shell script on remote host using SSH*
 # Select the right SSH site youâ€™ve configured before, 
 # In *post-build script*, enter 
  {{{
  /usr/share/tomcat6/bin/tomcat-deploy-petclinic fr.xebia.demo.petclinic-team-1
}}}

= Automated Tomcat Deployment with Rundeck = 

== Architecture ==

<img width="300" src="http://xebia-france.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/cont-delivery-img/jenkins-rundeck.png"/>

== Lab ==

Here is the configuration of the previous task with Rundeck.
 # Deploy a {{{tomcat-deploy-petclinic}}} shell script on the {{{tomcat-team-1-valid-1}}} and {{{tomcat-team-1-valid-2}}} servers
  # ssh connect as user tomcat to {{{tomcat-team-1-valid-1}}}
   {{{
ssh -i continuous-delivery-workshop.pem tomcat@ec2-46-51-145-155.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com
}}}
  # create a {{{/usr/share/tomcat6/bin/tomcat-deploy-petclinic}}} to download a new version of tomcat
   * See http://xebia-france.googlecode.com/svn/cloudcomputing/xebia-cloudcomputing-extras/trunk/src/main/scripts/fr/xebia/workshop/continuousdelivery/tomcat-deploy-petclinic

 # Connect to your Rundeck server http://ec2-46-51-157-205.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com:4440/ (login=admin, password=admin)
 # Create a new project "{{{deploy-petclinic-on-tomcat-valid}}}"
 # Connect via SSH to the rundeck server: 
  {{{
ssh -i continuous-delivery-workshop.pem ec2-user@ec2-46-51-157-205.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com
}}}
  # Update the project configuration files in "{{{/var/rundeck/projects/deploy-petclinic-on-tomcat-valid/etc/}}}":
   # Modify the *{{{project.properties}}}* to add ssh private key for the workshop
   {{{
project.ssh-keypath=/var/rundeck/.ssh/continuous-delivery-workshop.pem
}}}
  # Add your Valid Tomcat servers in *{{{resources.xml}}}*:
  <code language="xml">
<node 
	name="valid-tomcat-1" 
	description="valid-tomcat-1" 
	tags="tomcat,valid" 
	hostname="ec2-46-51-145-155.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com" 	
	osArch="i386" 
	osFamily="unix" 
	osName="Linux" 
	osVersion="" 
	username="tomcat" 
	privateIpAddress="10.235.74.151" 	
	privateDnsName="ip-10-235-74-151.eu-west-1.compute.internal"
	editUrl="https://console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/home?region=eu-west-1"/>
<node 
	name="valid-tomcat-2" 
	description="valid-tomcat-2" 
	tags="tomcat,valid" 
	hostname="ec2-46-51-146-254.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com" 	
	osArch="i386" 
	osFamily="unix" 
	osName="Linux" 
	osVersion="" 
	username="tomcat" 
	privateIpAddress="10.235.47.126" 	
	privateDnsName="ip-10-235-47-126.eu-west-1.compute.internal"
	editUrl="https://console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/home?region=eu-west-1"/>
</code>
 # Go back to [http://ec2-46-51-157-205.eu-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com:4440/ Rundeck web admin console]
 # Create a new job:
  * Save this Job?: {{{YES}}}
  * Name: {{{tomcat-deploy-petclinic}}}
  * Shell command: 
     {{{
  /usr/share/tomcat6/bin/tomcat-deploy-petclinic fr.xebia.demo.petclinic-team-1
}}}
  * Dispatch to Node: {{{checked}}}
  * Includes: {{{tags}}}, type "{{{tomcat}}}"
  * Click on *Create and Run*
